data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Mopti, Mali.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mopti, Mali
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Mopti to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Mopti, Mali. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Mopti, Mali that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Pana, Sama people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, encourage the 13,522 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Mopti prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Mopti, Mali has a population of 2,037,300.

We estimate Mopti has 13,522 people who might know Jesus, 43,543 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,980,235 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 150 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Mopti words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."
